activity: Pick up at the Thong Salad Pier in Koh Phangan.
Three freshly prepared delicious meals (Accepting some requests).
Bathroom kit (toothbrush,toothpaste coconut oil for body & hair shampoo & treatment butterfly pea deodorant coffee scrub soap small drying towel).
Gift kit (water bottle, pen, pencil, notebook, eraser, surprise gifts)
Bed positioned for deep restoring sleep (using your kua number).
An ice bath solo trip with meditation guidance.
Return to the Thong Salad Pier in Koh Phangan.
Thai Yoga Massage Course with Dr. Chandra Kumar.
Songkran experience. A water gun for the part.
